original_title: Sri Lanka Insurance expand its islandwide presence
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Insurance expands its presence in the Northern and Uva regions with the opening of the Agency Business Development Centers (ABDC) in Kaithady, Vishwamadu and Hettipola (Mahiyanganaya)
The Kaithady ABDC was opened at A9 Road, Kaithady whilst the Vishwamadu ABDC was opened at Mullaitivu Rd, Vishwamadu. The opening of both ABDCs took place on the 12th of December 2023.
The Hettipola (Mahiyanganaya) ABDC was opened on the 15th of December 2023 at Yasiru Enterprises, Wilgamuwa, Hettipola.

The occasions were graced by SLIC’s Chief Business Officer Ms. Namalee A. Silva, Assistant General Manager/Head of National Sales (Life) Mr. Jagath Welgama, Northern and Uva regionals management, Branch Management of Chavakachcheri, Mullaitivu, and Mahiyangana representing Life and General categories. Distinguished invitees and customers of the area were also in attendance at both events.
Agency Business Development Centers allows SLIC to further enhance its reach, which provides convenience and speed of service delivery to its loyal customers in relation with their protection needs.
